reviews.review_content:
Each week a different expert from the Earth Institute presents a lecture on their area of expertise.  If the subjects that the presenterâ€™s speak on interest you then you are in luck, if not then not.  It seemed that all of the speakers spoke about subjects around the issue of climate change (and/or sustainability).  Overall, the presenters are interesting and good presenters.
The technical level of the talks were, in general, reasonable for anyone who is generally familiar with sustainability / climate change issues.  Some talks were fairly technical and others less so.

Readings in preparation for each weekâ€™s speaker, four papers (for those registered for taking this class for three credits) and one five minute presentation which is based upon material from the fourth paper.
